functions.tag: {CustomModelData:2,display:{Name:'{"translate":"泉に落ちた斧","color":"#666666","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"とある若者が泉に落とした","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}','{"translate":"不思議な斧","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}','{"translate":"使い古され、ボロボロになっている","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}']},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.035d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,21],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:17d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-2.24d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.35d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,61],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:0.8,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
